events.title: "Air Ministry Receives Comprehensive Report on East African Operations from February to April 1941"
events.description: The full report on Air Operations in East Africa from 10th February to 5th April, 1941, has been forwarded to Air Ministry, but a Summary of these operations is included in this Despatch.

events.title: "Historic Command: British Pacific Fleet's Aircraft Carriers Prepare for Action - February 10, 1945"
events.description: Office of Flag Officer Commanding Aircraft Carriers, British Pacific Fleet. 10th February, 1945.

events.title: "Operation Overland: Airborne Supplies Sustain Long Range Brigade in Chindwin Campaign"
events.description: 35. The long range penetration brigade which was making its way across the Chindwin overland towards Katha received its first airborne suppiies on 10th February, and its maintenance thereafter became a continuous commitment. The remaining two brigades were landed on two strips improvised in the jungle during the nights of S5th/6th and 10th/11th March, and a fourth and fifth brigade were flown into another landing ground during the nights of 24th/25th March and 5th/6th April. The successful accomplishment of the air side of this operation was shared directly by the First Air Commando Unit and by the British and American Transport squadrons which â€˜participated, although the whole operation was only made possible by the high degree of air superiority gained by the tactical air forces in the preceding months.
